title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 369.11 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 369.11 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, copies of records shall be provided: (1)
at a rate of up to 25 cents per photocopy
up to 9 by 14 inches; or
(2)
upon
payment of the actual cost of reproduction, if the record or personal
information cannot be photocopied. (c) The actual cost of reproduction shall be
based upon the average unit cost for copying a record, excluding fixed costs of
the division, such as operator salaries and overhead. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
369.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
